description.jp: タブナジア住民によって編成された自警団のリーダー。何事にも自ら突っ込んでいく 男勝りの性格で天真爛漫な少女。「忌むべき子」と恐れられているが 世界を蝕む「虚ろなる闇」に深い関わりを持っており 冒険者と共に真実と向き合う。
description.gl: An impatient yet strong-minded woman who doesn't try to hide her true nature. While she is the leader of the Tavnazian Safehold's patrol, she was once feared and referred to as "that detestable child." Deeply linked to the Emptiness, she sets out on a journey to uncover the truth.

jp.text: ……ふっふっふ\n……そのどっちもハズレだぜ！
プリッシュ様なんだからな！
俺が来たからにゃ\nもーだいじょうぶだぜ！
よくわかんねぇが わかったぜ！
ここで命をかけなきゃ\n女がすたるってもんだ！
なんかおもしろいことが\nおきんだ！
あきらめさえしなきゃ\n人にはいくらでも生き残る\nチャンスはあるんだ！

gl.text: Heh heh heh... You're way off the mark、 ladies!
For I am the great Prishe!
Hey、 guys! Sorry to keep you hanging. But now that I'm here、 everything'll be just peachy.
Got it! Now how the hell am I supposed to find this Mentalworks place...?
It's time to put it all on the line!
People can do anything if they don't give up hope!

desc.en:
「One Ilm Punch」 use +1

When using 「One Ilm Punch」:
- Tremendously raises BRV potency 
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
- Triggers an HP attack after use
- Raises BRV by 30% of HP Damage dealt
- Lowers Action Delay
- Does not increase turn count
- Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count

Turns 「Howling Fist (Transfixion)」 into 「Howling Fist (Transfixion)+」
- Becomes a 3-HIT melee BRV attack that ignores Defense
　∟ + 2-HIT Holy magic BRV attack that ignores Defense
　∟ + HP Attack
- Tremendously raises total BRV potency
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 180% Max BRV
- Moderately improves 「Critical Rate Up」 and extends its duration by 3 turns

After using 「One Ilm Punch」:
- Turns 「Backhand Blow (Detonation)」 into 「Backhand Blow (Detonation)+」
　∟ Triggers an HP attack after use

When using 「Howling Fist (Fusion)」:
- Raises BRV based on Attack
　∟ + 3-HIT melee BRV attack
　∟ + 2-HIT Fire/Holy magic BRV attack
- Tremendously raises BRV potency 
- Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
desc.gl:
One-Ilm Punch use +1

When using One-Ilm Punch: 
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Triggers additional HP attack on target after use
 • Increases BRV by 30% of HP damage dealt
 • Turn rate+
 • Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning, support

Howling Fist: Transfixion becomes Howling Fist: Transfixion+ (3-hit melee BRV attack that ignores DEF + 2-hit Holy magic BRV attack that ignores DEF + HP attack; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%; slight Critical Hit Rate Up, duration +3)

After using One-Ilm Punch:
 • Backhand Blow: Detonation becomes Backhand Blow: Detonation+ (triggers additional HP attack on target after use)

When using Howling Fist: Fusion:
 • Increases BRV based on ATK before first BRV attack 
 • 3-hit melee BRV attack + 2-hit Fire Holy magic BRV attack; tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
